text.page:
226
096-113b @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /i ri mi ri/ d+ha daM me/ ba hu pha laM b+ha ba tu swA hA/ gos phrugs gcig la lan stong bzlas brjod byas te/ mi ya rabs sam/ slob dpon nam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba gcig la byin na/ zla ba phyed phan chad kyis gos phrugs brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nor zas sam/ rkang 'gros gang yang rung ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /gos brgya thob pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
